entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for March 16, 2024

summary.caption: “Dave! Ain’t that your horse that kid is messin’ with?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for March 16, 2024

summary.caption: And so it went, night after night, year after year. In fact, the Hansens had been in a living hell ever since that fateful day the neighbor’s “For Sale” sign had come down and a family of howler monkeys had moved in.
